name: G-Stream G2020
overview: GStream G2020 is an amazing shooter with awesome GFX and nervous gameplay, produced by Oriental Soft in 2002. Toshiaki Fujino who is the lead programmer, is also the founder of Triangle Service, well known for classics as XII Stag and Trizeal.br br The efforts made on GStream G2020 are absolutely incredible, we just have to see all of the GFX details, to realize with what professionalism the developpers have worked.br br People who have played that game often talk about a Raiden Raizing halfbreed.
